events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product isn’t what I expected and I want to request a refund because it doesn’t match the description.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the keywords provided about returning the product and money back.
An available refund specialist has been assigned to handle this case to ensure the customer is assisted promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that the product did not meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process it quickly for you?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The item was described as a leather wallet but it feels like plastic and looks different from the pictures.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order. You should receive your money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and for processing the refund. That really helps, and I appreciate your assistance.
The refund request has been completed successfully in our system. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory now. Thank you for your patience!
As we’ve confirmed your refund was processed and you’re satisfied with the resolution, we are closing this case. Have a great day!
